item.description:
NOTICE-Wed.s standout has been canceled (snow) but Thurs. and Fri. are on!

 

 

Thurs. 1/1, Fri. 1/2 (5:30-7:30PM) Presidential Candidate Comparison Sheet Distribution Boston North and south Stations Derail the myths at the Commuter Rails – Please join your fellow MActivists to hand out presidential candidate comparison sheets at Boston’s North and South Stations * note 3 different nights! Tons of people from all over Massachusetts commute in to Boston for work using the commuter lines. Let’s remind them to vote and get some information in their hands about their choices.
item.name: South Station and North Station Standouts
